column1: #Text=" Well , I must say he 's a cool one , " remarked Tom , as the echoes of Mr. Berg 's steps died away .
#Text=" The idea of thinking his boat better than ours ! I do n't like that man , dad .

#Text=It certainly is a great machine ,  remarked the lad as he looked up at the cigar-shaped bulk towering over his head .

_	_	_	_

#Text=It looks all right ,  commented Mr. Sharp . " Whether it will work is another question .

_	_	_	_

#Text= Yes , we ca n't tell until it 's in the water , " conceded Tom .
